department.name: Quality Assurance
department.description: Ensures the quality and reliability of software through systematic testing.

skills.name: Manual Testing
skills.description: The process of manually testing software for defects by executing test cases without automation tools.

skills.name: Automation Testing
skills.description: The use of software tools and scripts to automate the execution of tests and verification of results.

skills.name: Test Case Design
skills.description: The process of creating test cases that will be used to verify the functionality of a software application.

skills.name: Regression Testing
skills.description: Testing existing software functionality to ensure that new changes do not negatively affect previously working features.

skills.name: Performance Testing
skills.description: Evaluating the performance of an application under different conditions, including load and stress testing.

skills.name: Bug Tracking
skills.description: The practice of tracking defects and issues reported during testing, ensuring they are addressed in a timely manner.

skills.name: Continuous Integration (CI)
skills.description: The practice of frequently integrating code changes into a shared repository, allowing automated tests to verify the changes.

skills.name: Selenium
skills.description: A popular framework for automating web browser interactions, used in automated testing.

skills.name: JIRA
skills.description: A tool for project management and bug tracking commonly used in software development and QA processes.

skills.name: API Testing
skills.description: The practice of testing the APIs that connect different software systems to ensure they perform as expected.

skills.name: Test Management Tools
skills.description: Tools used to plan, execute, and track testing activities, such as TestRail or Quality Center.

skills.name: Version Control (Git)
skills.description: A system for tracking changes to code and managing versions, allowing multiple developers to work on the same project.

skills.name: Agile Methodology
skills.description: A set of principles for software development that promotes iterative development, flexibility, and customer collaboration.

skills.title: QA Engineer
skills.description: Responsible for executing test cases, reporting bugs, and ensuring product quality.
